snippet.title: Ravenswatch | Gameplay Overview
snippet.description:
Add to your wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2071280/Ravenswatch/

Ravenswatch is a top-down roguelite action game that combines intense real-time combat with deep gameplay and high replay value. Developed by the studio behind the widely acclaimed game Curse of the Dead Gods, Ravenswatch asks those who dare to confront the hordes of Nightmares, which are corrupting the world of Reverie.

Play alone or with your friends to defeat the Nightmare and reach the final chapter, you will need a strong build, focus and excellent teamwork. Increase your fighting power in battles then face the level boss when you feel ready… or when you no longer have a choice!

#Ravenswatch Early Access will begin April 6, 2023 exclusively on Steam and will release on PC & Consoles in 2024.
